title: [GAMEPLAY]
body: since the last update , the game gives me problems . I have to double- click for all, I can not put trincket , I can not move the cam and I can not send signals. I tried to solve it by resetting the video card is repairing the errors from the main screen . I do not know what to do

replies.body:
To be honest, it sounds like there is something just wrong with your in-game settings that need to be completely wiped and reset.  In order to do this:

1. Make sure you are signed into League and are on the Client
2. Open your installation of League:  C:/Riot Games --> League of Legends --> Config
3. Find the files game.cfg, input.ini and persistedsettings.json and delete them.

Once you start a new game, everything will be set to default which should hopefully resolve your issues.  Let me know if the problems persist!

The steps are ssentially the same, but you have to find League in your Applications folder.  For example:

* Start and Sign into League of Legends
* Navigate to Go
* Click on Applications
* Right-click League of Legends
* Show Package Contents
* Navigate through Contents -> LoL -> Config
* Delete Game.cfg and PersistedSettings.json
* Load into a Custom Game
